name: WhatStickers.in | Custom Personal Sticker Maker
description: WhatStickers is a Sticker maker that can help you create your own sticker packs with photos from your gallery and share it with your friends!  It is very easy to create a sticker pack with this app for Whatsapp  Steps to make a sticker pack:  1. Open the app, Agree to terms, Then click on Create sticker pack 2. Enter the name and publisher name for your new pack, then select a logo for your sticker pack. 3. Click on Add New to add stickers, Select Image and Draw the outline for your sticker and add a minimum of 3 stickers upto 30 stickers. 4. Click on Add to Whatsapp to publish your new sticker pack to whatsapp.   WhatStickers is also supported for Whatsapp business too. So if you are a WhatsApp business user, dont worry! we got you covered.    If you loved this sticker maker app, please give us a five star rating to support us. Thank you!
